Name: 东方试闻广纪 ~ Perfect Memento of Touhou Question
About the game: ““Imperishable Night has a PH level”? What a joke, how about a Sakuya level?” 　　 ““Mamizou is afraid of human”? Quit making me laugh.” 　　 ““Patchouli uses the ancient Chinese symbol for her magic”? Come on, now you are not even trying, she is an European.” 　　In this game, you will face Hundreds of Touhou rumours of it's origin setting, Some of them are right, Others are totally lies.Judge them as Right or Wrong, even if you choose wrong, you will still get the detailed explanation and the place they come from.So let's move, do a little test of your Touhou knowledge, shall we? 　　 Caution：This game is not suitable for those people who don't know about Touhou that much, if you don't even know what most of those questions mean, it means you don't have that much Touhou knowledge to play this game. In that case, this game is not for you, sorry. Made by Bawu Team Origin by ©Team Shanghai Alice/Zun This game follows the Touhou Project Steam Publishing Statute
